title: I got banned :/
body:
Hello, so about 2 months ago i got my account permanently banned for being toxic. So i wanna apologise for being toxic and i want to get 1 more chance on my account. Account over LVL30 with lots of champs and a few skins, played over a year and had like 1500hours on the account... If you are willing to unban my account the summoner name is "Fr0zenPony".
Regards,
Arnas

replies.body: Once an account reaches the permanent suspension level I don't believe they ever get reversed unless it happened due to a hacker or something like that. You're always more than welcome to hit up those agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) though to talk about your account.
